attributes.action: Turn up the volume on the "buy British" message and help small businesses prosper.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned are truly disappointed that the government have not put their whole weight behind the "Buy British" message.  Our once proud industrial heritage lies in tatters - neutered by the likes of Tesco's and Sainsbury and other super stores.  Give Britain back to the British small business, allow them to flourish, allow them to be innovative and competitive.  Allow them to trade with the minimum of administrative and taxable burden.  Reward success. Small Businesses will turn the tide of the current economic depression.  Make Britain Proud allow it to happen. Signed Ruth Waterson - Age 10.
